content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: Hello there. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I believe that we can come to an agreement on the rental price. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
500 Euros per month.

I am willing to pay 450 Euros per month.
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: I appreciate your offer, but I'm afraid I cannot accept that price. I would be looking for something in the range of 550-600 Euros per month. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
600 Euros per month.

I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month.

I apologize for my previous offer, I made a mistake.

I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month.
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: I see. While I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, I'm afraid I still cannot accept that price. I would be looking for something in the range of 650-700 Euros per month. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine
